error.USERNAME_NOT_UNIQUE: This user name is already in use
error.USER_ALREADY_EXIST: This username or email is already in use
error.LOGIN_UNKNOWN: This login isn't associated with any accounts - if you already have an account, then login with username/email and password. Or you can register a new account.
error.PROVIDER_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_IN_USE: This profile is already connected to another account
error.EMAIL_IN_USE: The email is already in use
error.MISSING_PARAMETERS: Invalid confirmation link. The confirmation code or username is missing.
error.CONFIRMATION_FAILED: Invalid or expired confirmation code. Please check your email or request a new confirmation.
error.CRYPTO_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your browser does not support the required cryptographic features. Please update your browser or try a different one.
error.PROOF_OF_WORK_FAILED: Proof of work failed. Please contact the helpdesk for assistance.
error.PROOF_OF_WORK_NOT_READY: Please wait while we verify your request.
error.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
error.UNKNOWN_USER: Unable to log in. Invalid username/password combination -or- user email not validated.
error.LOGIN_FAILED: Login failed. Please check your username and password and try again.
error.REGISTRATION_FAILED: Registration failed. Please check your input and try again.
error.UNABLE_TO_LOGOUT: Unable to log out. Please try again later.
error.INVALID_REQUEST: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
error.INVALID_PASSWORD: Invalid password. Please ensure your password meets the required criteria.
error.INVALID_INPUT: Invalid input. Please check your details and try again.

profile.passwordsNotIdentical: The two passwords are not identical
profile.invalidLinkMessage: The verification link is invalid or the account has already been activated.
profile.accountConfirmed: Your account has been confirmed and you are now logged in
profile.emailVerification: Please activate your account by verifying below
profile.unknownUser: Unable to log in. Invalid username/password combination -or- user email not validated.
profile.signInAgreement: By signing in you accept GBIFs [terms](/terms) and [privacy policy](/terms/privacy-policy).
profile.invalidUsername: A valid username is 3-64 characters and only contains lowercase letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and the characters ._-
profile.passwordLength: Password must be 6 characters or more
profile.passwordMaxLength: Your password may not exceed 256 characters
profile.selectAllImages: Select all images below like this one
profile.passwordChangeInvalid: Invalid password - if you have forgotten your password, then log out and use the password reset
profile.verficationLinkSent: An email has been sent to the specified email address containing a link that must be clicked to activate your account.
profile.resetPasswordMessage: We have sent you a mail with a link to reset your password. If you do not receive the message, please contact the help desk
profile.signInToAccount: Please sign in to your account
profile.enterEmailFirst: Please enter your email address first
profile.signUpForAccount: Sign up for your new account
profile.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
profile.setPasswordSubtitle: Please enter your new password below
profile.updatingPasswordMessage: Please wait while we update your password...
profile.passwordUpdatedMessage: Your password has been successfully updated
profile.passwordUpdatedSuccess: Your new password is now active. You can now sign in with your new password.
profile.updateFailedMessage: We were unable to update your password
profile.updateFailedHelp: If you continue to have problems, please contact support or try the password reset process again.
profile.registrationFailed: Registration failed. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
profile.proofOfWorkFailedContactHelpdesk: Proof of work failed. Please contact the helpdesk for assistance.
profile.waitingForServer: Verifying your request with the server. Please hang on and do not close this page.
profile.cryptoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the required cryptographic features. Please update your browser or try a different one.
profile.checkYourEmail: Please check your email to activate your account
profile.registrationSuccessCheckEmail: We've sent you an email with instructions to activate your account. Please check your inbox and follow the link to complete your registration.
profile.connectedAccountsDescription: Connect your social accounts to enable quick sign-in and enhanced features.
profile.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure. Make sure your new password is strong and unique.
profile.connectGoogleForSignIn: Connect your Google account for easy sign-in
profile.connectGithubForSignIn: Connect your GitHub account for easy sign-in. Github is also where we manage our issue reports, so it helps us keep in contact with you.
profile.connectOrcidForResearch: Connect your ORCID for easy login and to link you to records published to GBIF.
